mapper.select: SELECT Q_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL as questionNum FROM dual
mapper.insert: insert into Q_Board( questionNum, userNum, timeLimit, qstatus, regDate, modDate, title, hit, questionContent, MinorNum, videoSrc, score ) values( #{questionNum}, #{userNum}, #{timeLimit}, #{qstatus}, sysdate, sysdate, #{title}, 0, #{questionContent}, #{MinorNum}, #{videoSrc}, 0 )
mapper.delete: delete Q_BOARD where usernum = #{usernum} and QuestionNum = #{QuestionNum}
mapper.select: select * from major order by majorNum
select * from minor order by minorNum
select * from Q_Board, tag where Q_Board.questionNum = #{questionNum} and Q_Board.questionNum = tag.questionNum(+)

select * from tag, (select rownum as r, results.* from (select merged.* from (select selected.* from (select q_board.* from q_board, (select * from tag, (select max(tagnum) as tags from tag
or lower(tag) like lower('%${item}%')
group by questionnum ) searchedtag where tag.tagnum = searchedtag.tags ) targetQstn where q_board.questionnum = targetQstn.questionnum ) selected where #{searchType} = 'tag'
union all
select selected.* from (select q_board.* from userinfo, q_board where q_board.usernum = userinfo.USERNUM(+) and lower(userinfo.USERNAME) like lower('%${item}%')
union
select q_board.* from q_board, (select questionnum from q_reply, userinfo where q_reply.usernum = userinfo.usernum(+) and lower(userinfo.USERNAME) like lower('%${item}%') group by questionnum )targetQstn where q_board.questionnum = targetQstn.questionnum ) selected where #{searchType} = 'author'
union all
select selected.* from (select q_board.* from q_board
and lower(title) like lower('%${item}%')
union
select q_board.* from q_board, (select questionnum from q_reply
and lower(replytitle) like lower('%${item}%')
group by questionnum )targetQstn where q_board.questionnum = targetQstn.questionnum ) selected where #{searchType} = 'title'
union all
select selected.* from (select q_board.* from q_board
and contains( questioncontent, '%${item}%') >0
union
select q_board.* from q_board, (select questionnum from q_reply
and contains( replycontent, '%${item}%') >0
group by questionnum ) targetQstn where q_board.questionnum = targetQstn.questionnum ) selected where #{searchType} = 'content' )merged order by merged.questionnum desc ) results )numbered where r >= ${from} and r <= ${to} and numbered.questionnum = tag.questionnum(+) order by numbered.questionnum desc, tag.tagnum

select * from tag, (select rownum as r, results.* from (select merged.* from (select selected.* from (select q_board.* from userinfo, q_board where q_board.usernum = userinfo.USERNUM(+) and lower(userinfo.USERNAME) like lower('%${item}%')
union
select q_board.* from q_board, (select questionnum from q_reply, userinfo where q_reply.usernum = userinfo.usernum(+) and lower(userinfo.USERNAME) like lower('%${item}%') group by questionnum )targetQstn where q_board.questionnum = targetQstn.questionnum ) selected where #{searchType} = 'author' )merged order by merged.questionnum desc ) results )numbered where r >= ${from} and r <= ${to} and numbered.questionnum = tag.questionnum(+) order by numbered.questionnum desc, tag.tagnum
select tag from tag where questionNum = #{questionNum} order by tag asc

SELECT questionNum, trunc ((TO_char (sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_char (REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))/(30*12), 0) year , trunc ((TO_char (sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_char (REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))/30, 0) month , trunc (TO_char (sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_char (REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 0) day , trunc ((TO_char (sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_char (REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')), 0)*24 hour , trunc ((TO_char (sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_char (REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')), 0)*24*60 minute FROM q_board where questionNum = #{questionNum}
select * from Q_Board, tag where Q_Board.questionNum = tag.questionNum(+)

select * from tag, (select q_board.* from q_board, (select q_reply.* from q_reply, (select max(replynum) as answered from q_reply group by questionnum ) reply where q_reply.replynum = reply.answered ) no_dupl where q_board.questionnum = no_dupl.questionnum(+) and no_dupl.questionnum is null ) no_answer where no_answer.questionnum = tag.questionnum(+) order by no_answer.questionnum
